DOC.brief_summary: This is a safety and efficacy study of abicipar pegol in patients with neovascular age-related macular degeneration.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Efficacy Study of Abicipar Pegol in Patients With Neovascular Age-related Macular Degeneration
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of agerelated macular degeneration in at least 1 eye Best corrected visual acuity of 20/40 to 20/320 in the study eye Best corrected visual acuity of 20/200 or better in the nonstudy eye History of vitrectomy, macular surgery, or glaucoma surgery in the study eye Cataract or refractive surgery in the study eye within the last 3 months
